translation-contributors: Contribuidores: Torre de Timor, Netherfoam, KaiNoMood, Mgazul, JackTheChicken e Andre_601
not-looking-at-shop: Não conseguimos encontrar uma QuickShop. Você precisa estar olhando para uma.
no-permission: &cVocê não tem permissão para fazer isso.
3rd-plugin-build-check-failed: &c3rd party plugin &l{0}&r&c denied the permission checks, did you have permission setup in there?
no-creative-break: &cYou cannot break other players shops in creative mode, switch to survival mode or try to use the supertool {0} instead.
trading-in-creative-mode-is-disabled: &cYou cannot trade with this shop while being in creative mode.
supertool-is-disabled: &cSupertool is disabled. Cannot break any shops.
no-double-chests: &cYou cannot create the double chest shop.
not-managed-shop: &cYou are not the owner or moderator of this Shop
price-too-cheap: &cO preço precisa ser maior do que &e${0}
no-price-change: &cThis wouldn't result in a price change!
player-bought-from-your-store-tax: &c{0} comprou {1} {2} de sua loja, e você pagou {3} em taxas.
you-cant-afford-to-change-price: &cCusta {0} para alterar o preço na sua loja.
shops-arent-locked: &cLembre-se, loja NÃO são protegidas contra roubo! Se você quer para os ladões, tranque-os com LWC, Lockette, etc!
negative-amount: &cVocê não pode trocar com valores negativos
not-a-number: &cVocê só pode inserir um número, sua entrada foi {0}.
not-a-integer: &cVocê deve inserir um número, sua entrada foi {0}.
shop-has-no-space: &cA loja só tem espaço para mais {0} de {1}.
the-owner-cant-afford-to-buy-from-you: &cIsto custa {0}, mas o dono da loja só tem {1}
shop-has-changed: &cA loja que você tentou usar mudou desde que você clicou nela!
nearby-shop-this-way: &aA loja está a {0} blocos de você.
buying-more-than-selling: &cCUIDADO: Você está comprando itens por mais do que os está vendendo!
owner-bypass-check:
&eIgnorado todas as verificações, operação bem sucedida! (Agora 
você é o dono da loja!)
reached-maximum-can-create: &cVocê já criou o máximo de lojas! ({0}/{1})
restricted-prices: &cPreço restrito para {0}: Mínimo de {1}, máximo de {2}
no-enough-money-to-keep-shops: &cVocê não tinha dinheiro suficiente para manter suas lojas! Todas as lojas foram removidas...
nothing-to-flush: &aVocê não tem novas mensagens da loja.
break-shop-use-supertool: &eVocê pode quebrar a loja usando a SuperTool.
failed-to-put-sign: &cNão há espaço suficiente na loja para colocar a placa de informações.
failed-to-paste: &cFalha ao carregar os dados no Pastebin. Verifique sua conexão com a internet e tente novamente. (Veja o console para detalhes)
warn-to-paste: &eColetando dados e enviando-os para Pastebin, isso pode demorar um pouco. &c&lCuidado: &cOs dados são mantidos públicos por uma semana! Pode vazar a configuração do servidor e outras informações confidenciais. Envie-o apenas para equipe/desenvolvedores confiáveis.
price-too-high: &cThe shop price is too high! You cannot create one with a price higher than {0}.
you-cant-create-shop-in-there: &cVocê não tem permissão para criar uma loja neste local.
unknown-player: &cTarget player doesn't exist, please check the username you typed.
shop-staff-cleared: &aSuccessfully removed all staff members from your shop.
shop-staff-added: &aSuccessfully added {0} as a staff member for your shop.
shop-staff-deleted: &aSuccessfully removed {0} as a staff member for your shop.
no-permission-build: &cVocê não pode construir uma loja aqui.
success-change-owner-to-server: Proprietário da loja definido como Server.
purchase-failed: &cPurchase failed: Internal Error. Please contact the Server Administrator.

menu.sell-tax-self: &aVocê não pagou impostos porque é dono desta loja.

how-many-buy: &aEnter in chat, how many you wish to &bBUY&a. You can buy &e{0}&a. Enter &ball&a to buy them all.
how-many-sell: &aEnter in chat, how much you wish to &dSELL&a. You have &e{0}&a available. Enter &ball&a in chat, to sell all.
not-allowed-to-create: &cVocê não pode criar uma loja aqui.
blacklisted-item: &cYou cannot sell this item because it is on the blacklist
how-much-to-trade-for: &aEnter in chat, how much you wish to trade &e{1}x {0}&a for.

command.invalid-bulk-amount: &cThe given value {0} is larger than max stack size or lower than one
command.no-trade-item: &aPlease hold a trade item to change in main hand
command.wrong-args: &cInvalid arguments. Use &l/qs help &rto preview the list of commands.

description.title: &aAjuda do QuickShop
description.price: &eChanges the buy/sell price of a shop
description.find: &eLocaliza a loja mais próxima de um tipo específico.
description.refill: &eAdiciona um dado número de itens a uma loja
description.create: &eCreates a new shop from the targeted chest
description.amount: &eTo set item amount (Useful when having chat issues)
description.size: &eChange per bulk amount of a shop
description.supercreate: &eCreate a shop while bypassing all protection checks
description.removeall: &eRemove ALL shops of a specified player

controlpanel.unlimited-hover: &eClique para alternar se a loja é ilimitada.
controlpanel.mode-selling-hover: &eClick to change the shop to BUY mode.
controlpanel.mode-buying-hover: &eClick to change the shop to SELL mode.
controlpanel.price-hover: &eClick to set a new price for the item.
controlpanel.empty-hover: &eClique para limpar o inventário da loja.
controlpanel.stack-hover: &eClick to set the amount of item per bulk. Set to 1 for normal behaviour.

list: {0} was released. You are still using {1}!
Surprise! {0} came out. You are on {1}
Looks like you need to update. {0} was released!
Ooops! {0} was now released. You are on {1}!
I swear, QS has been updated to {0}. Why have you not updated yet?
Fixing and re... Sorry, but {0} was released!
Err! Nope. This is not an error. {0} has been released!
MEU! {0} saiu! Por que você ainda está usando {1}?
Notícias de Hoje: O QuickShop foi atualizado para {0}!
Plugin k.i.a. You should update to {0}!
There is an update available Commander. {0} has just came out!
Look my style---{0} updated. You're still using {1}
What do you think? {0} has been released! Update!
Doctor, QuickShop has a new update {0}! You should update~
Ko~ko~da~yo~ QuickShop has a new update {0} ~
updatenotify.remote-disable-warning: &cThis version of QuickShop has been marked as disabled by the remote server. That means that this version may have serious issues. Receive details from our SpigotMC page: {0}. This warning will appear and spam your console until you switch to a not disabled version. This won't affect your server, however.

shop-removed-cause-ongoing-fee: &cYour shop at {0} was removed because you didn't have enough money to keep it!
digits-reach-the-limit: &cYou have reached the limits of decimals in the price.
backup-failed: Cannot backup the database. Check the console for details.
translate-not-completed-yet-click: The translation of the language {0} was not completed yet by {1}. Do you want to help us improving the translation? Click here!
translate-not-completed-yet-url: The translation of the language {0} was not completed yet by {1}. Do you want to help us improving the translation? Browse: {2}
shop-now-freezed: &aYou have frozen the shop. Nobody can trade with this shop now!
shop-nolonger-freezed: &aYou unfroze the shop. It's back to normal now!
shop-cannot-trade-when-freezing: &cYou cannot trade with this shop because it is frozen.
denied-put-in-item: &cYou cannot put this item into your shop!
how-many-buy-stack: &eEnter in chat, how many bulks you wish to &bBUY&a. There are &e{0}&a items in each bulk and you can buy &e{1}&a bulks. Enter &ball&a in chat to buy all.
how-many-sell-stack: &aEnter in chat, how many bulk you wish to &dSELL&a. There are &e{0}&a items per bulk and you have &e{1}&a bulks available. Enter &ball&a in chat to sell all.
